amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the DNA analysis and backlog elimination program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to increase by $10 million the amount provided for the DNA analysis and backlog elimination program. The amendment offsets the increase by reducing the bill's appropriation for the Justice Department's salaries and expenses by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
